MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the ML11 and ML12 postcode areas of Biggar, Lanark and Thankerton. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 9.30pm  to repair broken overhead equipment at Quothquan Lodge and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:32PM on Friday 13 November 2020.
